languages.text: "Даже самый прекрасный плод может гнить изнутри. Но пока не отрежешь кусочек — о том сложно узнать. Так загляни же в себя, элантах. Так ли идеален твой внутренний мир?"
"Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"
languages.original_text: "Даже самый прекрасный плод может гнить изнутри. Но пока не отрежешь кусочек — о том сложно узнать. Так загляни же в себя, элантах. Так ли идеален твой внутренний мир?"

traits.locale_text: "Even the finest fruit may rot from the inside. But it is hard to tell until you have cut off a slice. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you might think?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Even the finest fruit may rot from the inside. But it is hard to tell until you have cut off a slice. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you might think?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Incluso la más bella fruta puede pudrirse desde dentro, pero cuesta apreciarlo sin cortarle antes un pedazo. Mira en tu interior, elantach. ¿Es tu mundo interior tan perfecto como crees?».
languages.original_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"

traits.locale_text: «Incluso la más bella fruta puede pudrirse desde dentro, pero cuesta apreciarlo sin cortarle antes un pedazo. Mira en tu interior, elantach. ¿Es tu mundo interior tan perfecto como crees?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “即便是最甜美的水果，也会从内部腐烂。除非你切下一块，否则很难判断它是否真如外表那样光鲜。所以，审视自己的内心吧。你的内心世界，真的像你想象的那么完美吗？”
languages.original_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"

traits.locale_text: “即便是最甜美的水果，也会从内部腐烂。除非你切下一块，否则很难判断它是否真如外表那样光鲜。所以，审视自己的内心吧。你的内心世界，真的像你想象的那么完美吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Le plus beau des fruits peut pourrir de l'intérieur, mais il est difficile de le savoir avant d'en couper un morceau. Accordez-vous un instant d'introspection, elantach. Votre monde intérieur est-il aussi parfait que vous le pensez ? »
languages.original_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"

traits.locale_text: « Le plus beau des fruits peut pourrir de l'intérieur, mais il est difficile de le savoir avant d'en couper un morceau. Accordez-vous un instant d'introspection, elantach. Votre monde intérieur est-il aussi parfait que vous le pensez ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「どんなに美しい果物でも、内側から腐ることはある。だから自分の内面を見てみるのだ、エランタ。あなたの内面は、あなたが思っているほど本当に完璧だろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"

traits.locale_text: 「どんなに美しい果物でも、内側から腐ることはある。だから自分の内面を見てみるのだ、エランタ。あなたの内面は、あなたが思っているほど本当に完璧だろうか？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Selbst die schönste Frucht kann von innen heraus faulen. Doch man sieht es erst, wenn man ein Stück abgeschnitten hat. Also blickt in Euer Inneres, Elantach. Ist Eure innere Welt wirklich so perfekt, wie Ihr glaubt?"
languages.original_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"

traits.locale_text: "Selbst die schönste Frucht kann von innen heraus faulen. Doch man sieht es erst, wenn man ein Stück abgeschnitten hat. Also blickt in Euer Inneres, Elantach. Ist Eure innere Welt wirklich so perfekt, wie Ihr glaubt?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "En güzel meyvelerin bile içi çürüyebilir, kesmeden bilmek imkânsızdır. Kendine dön elantach. İç dünyan, düşündüğün kadar kusursuz mu?"
languages.original_text: "Even the most beautiful fruit can rot from the inside, but it is hard to tell until you cut off a piece. So look inside yourself, elantach. Is your inner world really as perfect as you think?"

traits.locale_text: "En güzel meyvelerin bile içi çürüyebilir, kesmeden bilmek imkânsızdır. Kendine dön elantach. İç dünyan düşündüğün kadar kusursuz mu?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
